tables.storage:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_storage` (
  `storage_id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `adapter` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_default` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `params_text` text CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_general_ci,
  PRIMARY KEY (`storage_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.storage_adapter:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_storage_adapter` (
  `id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `admin_form` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.storage_file:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_storage_file` (
  `file_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `origin_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `maker` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `storage_id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `size` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  `width` int(5) DEFAULT '0',
  `height` int(5) DEFAULT '0',
  `path` tinytext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `main_type` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `origin_id` (`origin_id`,`maker`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
tables.storage_file_tmp:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_storage_file_tmp` (
  `id` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `type` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `size` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `path` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `storage_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
